name: Forest Journey
description:
Welcome to Forest Journey, an interactive narrative which allows you to explore a forest and the life that co-exists within.

All you need is this screen, a piece of paper (your sketchpad) and a pen or pencil.

Designed for Now Play This 2022 by Charlotte Mallory, Kiran Jakhu, Lily McCraith, Lynsey Gibson and Yiran Zhou (Leslyn).

See the physical space design and player creations in the trailer:
